internal.database

Class FileList

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<java.lang.Comparable[]>
        • internal.database.FileList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Comparable[]>, java.util.Collection<java.lang.Comparable[]>, java.util.List<java.lang.Comparable[]>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class FileList
extends java.util.AbstractList<java.lang.Comparable[]>
implements java.util.List<java.lang.Comparable[]>, java.util.RandomAccess
    This class allows data tuples/tuples (e.g., those making up a relational table) to be stored in a random access file. This implementation requires that each tuple be packed into a fixed length byte array.

      java.lang.Comparable[] get(int i)
      Get the ith tuple by seeking to the correct file position and reading the record.
      int size()

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public boolean add(java.lang.Comparable[] tuple)
        Add a new tuple into the file list by packing it into a record and writing this record to the random access file. Write the record either at the end-of-file or into a empty slot.
        Specified by:
        add in interface java.util.Collection<java.lang.Comparable[]>
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        whether the addition succeeded
